title: Meet a VA Oncologist: Dr. Ruchika Gutt
summary: Bringing compassionate care and innovative treatment to our Veterans is a team of skilled, dedicated oncologists like Dr. Ruchika Gutt, Chief of Radiation Oncology at the Washington, DC VA Medical Center (VAMC). Keep reading as Dr. Gutt shares more about VA’s cancer innovations and how a little kindness goes a long way during treatment.
